title: Death Recap is Broken
body:
Death recap is broken. It shows what does the LEAST amount of contributing damage towards my death but fails to show the MOST damage that has contributed towards my death making it difficult to work out what to build or even who to look out for. Anyway a bunch of things spew from death recap being bugged, it's been going on for a while now.

Just a heads up.

replies.body: Been like this for years you think they would of fixed it by now but they are to busy putting out more champs then fixing the game
Keep in mind that I am HORSE OF FORCE.
